patthana14.21:1.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.21:2.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.21:3.1_0: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana14.21:4.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
